math.question: What is the smallest positive integer that is divisible by all the numbers from 1 to 20?

What values can have x, y and z ? (3x) - (2y) + z = 10 and (2x) + y - (3z) = -6 (Can be multiple choice)
What values can have x, y and z ? (2x) + (3y) = 8 and (4x) - (6y) = 6 (Can be multiple choice)
Which of the following numbers are prime numbers(Can be multiple choice)?
We represent a set as A = {1, 2, 3, 4, 5}. According to this, how many subsets does the set A have?
